name: plato
title: Plato Restoran
subtitle: Restoran PLATO nalazi se na platou Filozofskog fakulteta, u srcu Beograda. Kuhinja je internacionalna sa sofisticiranim i neobičnim ukusima. Naš meni se sastoji od pažljivo odabranih sastojaka. Kompletno zadovoljstvo je kreirano uz domaća i kvalitetna vina. PLATO restoran je mesto gde se neobični ukusi spajaju i pretvaraju u savršene obroke.

items.name: Pancakes
items.description: Fluffy pancakes served with a generous drizzle of rich maple syrup, topped with fresh strawberries and a dollop of whipped cream for the perfect sweet start to your day.

items.name: Omelette
items.description: A fluffy three-egg omelette packed with your choice of fillings, including sautéed mushrooms, fresh spinach, diced tomatoes, and melted cheese, served with a side of crispy hash browns.

items.name: French Toast
items.description: Thick slices of bread soaked in a creamy custard, griddled to golden perfection, and served with a sprinkle of powdered sugar and fresh berries for a delightful morning treat.

items.name: Greek Yogurt with Honey and Berries
items.description: Creamy Greek yogurt topped with fresh mixed berries and a drizzle of natural honey.

items.name: Caesar Salad
items.description: Crisp romaine lettuce tossed in our house-made Caesar dressing, topped with crunchy croutons and shaved Parmesan cheese, offering a classic taste that never goes out of style.

items.name: Grilled Chicken Sandwich
items.description: Juicy grilled chicken breast topped with fresh lettuce, ripe tomato, and a creamy garlic aioli, served on a toasted bun for a mouthwatering lunch experience.

items.name: Cheeseburger
items.description: A hearty beef patty grilled to perfection, topped with melted cheddar cheese, crisp lettuce, tomato, and our signature sauce, served on a toasted sesame seed bun with fries.

items.name: Nachos
items.description: Crispy tortilla chips generously topped with melted cheese, jalapeños, and a dollop of sour cream, served with fresh salsa on the side for dipping.

items.name: Spring Rolls
items.description: Crispy and light spring rolls filled with a colorful mix of fresh vegetables and served with a sweet chili dipping sauce for a delightful crunch.

items.name: Chocolate Cake
items.description: Decadent layers of rich chocolate cake filled with creamy chocolate ganache, topped with chocolate frosting and chocolate shavings.

items.name: Cheesecake
items.description: Creamy cheesecake on a buttery graham cracker crust, drizzled with your choice of strawberry or caramel sauce for added sweetness.

items.name: Tiramisu
items.description: A delightful Italian dessert made with layers of coffee-soaked ladyfingers and creamy mascarpone cheese, dusted with cocoa powder.

items.name: Brownie Sundae
items.description: Rich chocolate brownie topped with a scoop of vanilla ice cream, drizzled with chocolate sauce, and garnished with nuts and whipped cream.
